name: Chris Hartman

text: The pizza is really great for the price! I think most of the employees are college students and they are very nice and friendly. My new go-to pizza place!

text: Had a great experience with Blaze Pizza. Usually, we go in the restaurant to get the pizza as fresh as possible. However, this time, we ordered online. And guess what!? It was still a phenomenal pizza. The online interface was easy to use ‚Ä¶More

text: I frequent my local location almost daily for lunch. The staff is top notch, quality is great and the restaurant is very clean. Highly recommend!

text: Loved the pizza! In and out in 15 minutes and I was happy to see their masks being worn properly. Will come back again for some fresh artisanal pizza.

name: Mackenzie Hill
text: The pizza master Aidan absolutely made my day! His masked smile and attitude was the 'cheese' on top of a perfect pizza. I wanted a cheesy meatza and I couldn't ask for a better ratio and spread. Keep it up guys!

text: This is by far the best pizza place if you're around. Also arguably the best pizza chain in US.

text: This is essentially the down-the-line style of fast food restaurant seen at Chipotle, Subway, and many other restaurants. This concept is applied to pizza. My only concern is that it takes too long to cook the pizza after a quick assembly. ‚Ä¶More

text:
Great vegan and gluten free pizza, always tough to find good pizza with food restrictions. This

I really like the custom menu they have. I get to order a half 11in pizza and 4 garlic knots, how awesome is that! :)

name: Don Snipes

text: I have never seen a place of business with more unmotivated people. It seems like every one of them hated to be there. They should not make it that obvious. Even the face mask couldn't hide it.

name: Kel Z
text: Fast Fired!  It was delicious. Crust was crispy.  Toppings are all fresh. They have specialty pizzas that you can customize at no additional Charge ... or just do the build your own. There were a lot of topping choices, sauces, seasonings, ‚Ä¶More

text: Special shoutout to Keonna for being an awesome worker and being very patient with everyone in the line. She is the example of a great leader and I hope she sees this so she knows she‚Äôs doing great!

name: Alex Ilovan
text: This is really good pizza. First off, it is a thin crust pizza so expect that. The thin crust is cooked very well and is a perfect balance between crispy and soft. Folding a pizza slice makes it really easy to get a good bite. Ingredients tasted fresh and I have no complaints. I would recommend this pizza for lunch!
